title: SEO Consulting call (30 mins)

steps.title: Start Your SEO Consulting Call Job

stepItems.title: Payment
stepItems.help: It's a one off payment of $250, you will not be charged again.

stepItems.title: What website is the call for?
Create a login
stepItems.description: Add a new user to your site admin with the details shown below. Instructions for: Shopify, adding a staff member, Bigcommerce, adding a user.

stepItems.title: Answer the questions below as best as you can so that we can prepare for the call.
stepItems.description: You can press the help icon for more help on each one.

stepItems.title: What date and time would you like to have the call?
stepItems.help: Luke works in the UK and is on the GMT time zone. Where possible please ensure proposed call times are between 9am and 5pm UK time.

stepItems.title: How old is the store?
stepItems.help: Is the store new or a few years old?

stepItems.title: What marketing activities are you currently using to promote the store?
stepItems.help: Are you using paid advertising, social media or content production?

stepItems.title: What are your main sources of sales and traffic?
stepItems.help: You can find this information within Google Analytics

stepItems.title: What are your aims for this call?
stepItems.help: Let Luke what your aims are for the call

stepItems.title: Would you like a specific area of question researched before the call takes place?
stepItems.help: Please provide as much detail as possible or email information to luke@thepixelcrowd.com

stepItems.title: New SEO Consulting Call Job Ready
stepItems.subject: New {{ job_title }} job at Blimpon for you
stepItems.body:
New job created: {{ job_title }} at Blimpon

The customer has paid, provided access and answered the questions so it's now ready for your work.

stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work?
Has the consulting call taken place ...

description:
A 30 minute consulting call with Luke Masters via Skype. This call can be used to address a specific SEO issue or chat in general about improving the SEO setup of your Shopify store. A list of questions will be sent before the call to help understand what you would like to cover during the call and so Luke can prepare for the call. Common uses of consulting calls include the following:
  • Access current online marketing activity and give ideas for improvements
  • Suggestions from an SEO expert to improve your current store
  • Plan a strategy for future SEO and online marketing activity
  • Give ideas of content to produce to drive traffic
  • Chat about the type of sites your store could gain links from or partner with
